message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. I'm willing to start with an offer of $18000 for the product.

Hello Alice, thank you for considering my interest in the product. I appreciate your offer, but I am only able to pay up to $12000 for the product. I hope we can find a price that works for both of us.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking to save some money, but I'm afraid I need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get at least $16000 for the product. I'm willing to come down from my initial offer, but I need to make sure it's worth my while.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter your offer by suggesting a price of $14000 for the product. I hope this proposal will be acceptable to you.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm still not quite comfortable with the price of $14000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to think about my minimum price. I'll come down to $15500. This is as low as I'm willing to go.
Hello Alice, I understand your position and I respect your decision. I would like to propose a price of $15000 for the product. I hope this will be within your acceptable range.
